Group hierarchy: * AWS Pricing Calculator provides only an estimate of your AWS fees and doesn't include any taxes that might apply. Your actual fees depend on a variety of factors, including your actual usage of AWS services.

Monthly: EC2 - change Instance type, Storage amount
RDS - change Instance quantity from 1 to 5, change Storage amount upto 2000GB, change Additional backup storage upto 10TB

Route 53 - change Basic Checks Within AWS from 100 to 1000, change HTTPS Checks Within AWS from 100 to 1000, change HTTPS Checks Outside of AWS from 0 to 1000, change Number of Elastic Network Interfaces from 2 to 5
Amazon S3 - change Storage amount from 1000 - 50000GB, add 10000GB storage for S3 Standard - Infrequent Access, add config for S3 Glacier Deep Archive (100000GB storage)
VPC - change Number of Site-to-Site VPN Connections from 1 -> 20, change Data Processed per NAT Gateway 100 -> 2000, change Total processed bytes (in LCUs) from 100 -> 300
Elastic Load Balancing - change Processed bytes (EC2 Instances and IP addresses as targets) 10 -> 100
